pages.text: $(li)Press "TAB" to open toolgun GUI$(li)After choosing a mode text hints in upper left will usually tell you what actions you can do with it$(li)Press "R" to reset mode to the beginning$(li)Press "Z" to delete created constraints/ventities$(li)You can also use "Strip Mode" to delete constraints/ventities$(li)You can create setting presets for certain modes. To change preset hold "LAlt" and scroll mouse wheel.
